comment.body:
> I'm glad to hear it!

Without vpn I get this ad+ annoying AF popups. This issue is there in other simular sites as well can you guys look at this. I've tried with LTE same, with Ag DNS with or without filter same, Uninstalled reinstalled Ag app(premium v.) same. Disabled re-enabled filters in the safari settings same, I don't know why this is happening is there a ad virus in my phone? [https://www.veed.io/view/e585aace-c45b-49c3-8330-62f01007b04f?panel=showcase](https://www.veed.io/view/e585aace-c45b-49c3-8330-62f01007b04f?panel=showcase)
